functions.tag: {EquipmentType:"armor",EquipmentID:"liberhermetis",Rarity:"myt",SetId:"99",CustomModelData:10000002,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:3}],Unbreakable:1,display:{Name:"\"§8⟬§0⦚§3Liber§0⬤§3Hermetis§0⦚§8⦘\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§1⥪ Sic habebis gloriam totius mundi.\"}","{\"text\":\"§1⥪ Ideo fugiet a te omnis obscuritas.\"}","{\"text\":\"§1⥫ Completum est quod dixi de operatione Solis.\"}","{\"text\":\"§1⥫ Sic mundus creatus est.\"}","{\"text\":\"§1Bonus set completed§7: §7RES§a1 §7STR§a1 §7HAS§a1 §7SPD§a1 §7HER§a1 §7DAR§a1 §7LUC§a1 §7HUN§a1\"}"]},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:6.00,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,10002,0,10002]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:4.00,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,20002,0,20002]},{AttributeName:generic.max_health,Name:generic.max_health,Amount:4.0,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,30002,0,30002]},{AttributeName:generic.knockback_resistance,Name:generic.knockback_resistance,Amount:0.03,Operation:0,Slot:legs,UUID:[I;0,40002,0,40002]}]}
